name: react-decos
description: React decoratives for better intuitive code

reactDecos.enableComponentDecoration.description: Enable decoration for components (const arrow functions that are not hooks).

reactDecos.componentDecorationText.description: Text displayed after a component declaration.

reactDecos.enableFunctionDecoration.description: Enable decoration for functions (let arrow functions).

reactDecos.functionDecorationText.description: Text displayed after a function declaration.

reactDecos.enableHookDecoration.description: Enable decoration for hooks (const arrow functions whose name starts with 'use').

reactDecos.hookDecorationText.description: Text displayed after a hook declaration.

scripts.compile: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
